activities: Cielo Management Consulting performs management and human resources consulting services for clients including statistical analysis, employee assessments and employee surveys. As part of its consulting work, Cielo may collect or be given access to personally-identifiable information to process, analyze, or report.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
